resources.string: An app to schedule and record maintenance of cars, motorcycles, boats, and other vehicles

To the fullest extent allowed by law, this software comes with no warranty, either express or implied. By installing and/or using this software you agree to hold harmless Brigham Young University - Idaho and its sponsors, employees, and students.
How to use the Maintenance App
Well, this is embarrassing. Something is wrong with this part of the app, and it isn\'t working. We apologize.
Click the Add button either on top or the bottom to add your vehicle.
When you choose one of your vehicles, a menu of maintenance options will appear.
Select an option (oil, brakes, etc.), record the last time you performed maintenance on that item, and the app will inform you when it's time to check your vehicle in for maintenance.
